description:

title: Live-migrate queries original image which could be gone

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/45226
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/c6869914d631ffbbee46d46fcb54324e5f993309
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit c6869914d631ffbbee46d46fcb54324e5f993309
Author: John Garbutt <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Sep 5 13:51:01 2013 +0100

    Fix live-migrate when source image deleted
    
    We now cache the most import image details in system_metadata
    so if we unable to access the image, fallback to the cached image data.
    
    Fixes bug 1221200
    Change-Id: I58244a01c72c1ab764710dbccff3a1b1bacea1fe
